content: super simple work sock hat by katie pomper it s a canadian staple the classic pattern you know and love the heathered grey the white top and the bright red stripe if you re in the outdoors you need to be wearing this hat and now you and your whole family can knit and be merry i hope you like the pattern materials needed worsted weight yarn for this hat i used estelle wor- sted in #272 206 and 201 4 00mm and 5 00mm needles on a 16 cord or what- ever size that lets you achieve gauge plus 5 00mm dpn s/magic loop for decrease section 1 stitch marker darning needle scissors abbreviations and special techniques k knit gauge 18 sts per 4 /10cm p purl bor beginning of round sizing baby child adult s adult m/l pm place marker k2tog knit 2 stitches together written instructions decrease instructions with smaller needles and the white yarn co 60 round 1 k1 k2tog k1 p2 repeat to bor 72 84 96 stitches pm and connect in the round switch to white yarn ribbing round 2 k3 p2 repeat to bor k2 p2 repeat to bor knit ribbing for 4 4 5 5 rounds round 3 k3 p2tog repeat to bor all sizes with red yarn purl one round round 4 k3 p1 repeat to bor with red yarn continue in ribbing pattern for round 5 k1 k2tog p1 repeat to bor 3 3 4 4 rounds round 6 k2 p1 repeat to bor all sizes with white yarn purl one round round 7 k2tog p1 repeat to bor continue in ribbing pattern for 10 12 16 16 round 8 k1 p1 repeat to bor rounds round 9 k2tog repeat to bor body of hat cut yarn leaving a 10 tail and using a darning switch to larger needles needle weave yarn through remaining stitches pull tail through center hole at top of hat to reverse side using the grey yarn turning the hat inside out weave tail through remaining stitches and pull tight weave in remaining tail and trim leftover end round 1 k4 p2 repeat to bor and with that you re done great job enjoy your repeat round 1 until piece measures 5 5 6 5 hat 8 9 from cast-on round now it s time to decrease woo-hoo
